scripts.tauri: node -e "require('child_process').spawn('node', ['start.js'], {stdio: 'inherit', detached: true}); setTimeout(() => require('child_process').spawnSync('npx', ['tauri', ...process.argv.slice(2)], {stdio: 'inherit', shell: true}), 1000)"
scripts.tauri:dev: node -e "require('child_process').spawn('node', ['start.js'], {stdio: 'inherit', detached: true}); setTimeout(() => require('child_process').spawnSync('npx', ['tauri', 'dev'], {stdio: 'inherit', shell: true}), 1000)"
scripts.tauri:build: npm run prebuild:tauri && node -e "require('child_process').spawn('node', ['start.js'], {stdio: 'inherit', detached: true}); setTimeout(() => require('child_process').spawnSync('npx', ['tauri', 'build'], {stdio: 'inherit', shell: true}), 1000)"
